We have a full machine shop that specializes in tool and die, but with the capabilites to make or repair just about anything. From single parts to a production run, we can do it.

With two Elox EDMs (Electrical Discharge Machine) we can keep your business up and running. If you are in need of specialized tooling or dies, the refurbish/repair of tools or dies, or just purchasing custom parts, come by and see us. We may be able to make, refurbish, or repair and save you the cost.

We love rebuilding and restoring everything from old tools to old machines. Over the years we have restored or rebuilt old hand tools, machines, motorcycles, boats,and cars. While we don't do complete rebuilds on vehicles, we would love to help anyone with a project. From a broken bolt to a custom part we can help.

We do light welding and repair on parts as needed. While not a welding shop, we can accomplish this. For heavy structural type welding we have a specialized welding shop we work with.
